title.rendered: Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds featured in San Diego Premier

content.rendered:
After our product was featured at the recent 2012 Kitchen & Bath Industry Show in Chicago, Illinois, Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds were such a hit with the writer of San Diego Premier Magazine that he had to write about it in his recent issue!

Learn more about our products and other highlights from the Kitchen & Bath Industry Show at San Diego Premier.com.
